title: Business & Finance
text:
Didi is considering going private to placate authorities in China and compensate investors for losses incurred since the ride-hailing giant listed in the U.S. in June.

---

Nikola founder Trevor Milton was indicted on securities-fraud charges for allegedly lying to investors about the company's business making commercial trucks powered by alternative fuel.

---

Credit Suisse knew Archegos was a massive risk and didn't take actions to fix it, according to an investigation the bank commissioned into the collapse of the family investment firm.

---

Amazon posted strong results that showcased its dominance even as a slight slowdown in e-commerce sales highlighted the challenge of sustaining the growth it has logged during the pandemic.

---

Scarlett Johansson sued Disney , alleging her contract was breached when the company released "Black Widow" on the Disney+ streaming service at the same time as its theatrical debut.

---

U.S. stocks rose, with the Dow and S&P 500 both advancing 0.4% and the Nasdaq gaining 0.1%.

---

Procter & Gamble said David Taylor would step down as chief executive. He will be succeeded on Nov. 1 by Jon Moeller , his top deputy.
